name: gofetch-wasm
description: A robust HTTP client library compiled from Go to WebAssembly for JavaScript/TypeScript applications

scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\n⚠️  gofetch-wasm: You are using v1.0.14. If upgrading from 1.0.12 or 1.0.13, this version includes complete API exports for setRetryOptions().\n')"

author: Nikos Kechris
